entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is mentioned as someone whose hands are hard to tell apart from others.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as making a dispassionate comment about the game.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as playing the game and receiving praise from Ginny.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as not looking like he will be surfacing soon.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is mentioned as trotting after Ginny and having yellow eyes fixed on Arnold.

entities.name: arnold
entities.description: Arnold is mentioned as being the target of Crookshanks' attention.

entities.name: romilda vane
entities.description: Romilda Vane is mentioned as someone Harry sidesteps in order to push open the portrait hole.

entities.name: the fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is mentioned as being depicted in a portrait that Harry pushes open.

relationships.description: Ginny praises Harry's game, saying 'Good game, Harry'.
Crookshanks has yellow eyes fixed on Arnold.
